TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void ComponentChangedEventHandler(object sender, ComponentChangedEventArgs e);
.class public auto ansi sealed ComponentChangedEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub ComponentChangedEventHandler(sender As Object, e As ComponentChangedEventArgs)
public delegate void ComponentChangedEventHandler(System::Object ^ sender, ComponentChangedEventArgs ^ e);

param.name: e
param.span: Objeto que contiene los datos del evento.

span.span: A that contains the event data.

summary.span: Representa el método que procesará un evento .

span.span: Represents the method that will handle a event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Cuando se crea un delegado , se identifica el método que controlará el evento.When you create a delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event. Para asociar el evento al controlador, se debe agregar una instancia del delegado al evento.To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event. Siempre que se produce el evento, se llama a su controlador, a menos que se quite el delegado.The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate. Para obtener más información sobre los delegados de controladores de eventos, vea [NIB: delegados y eventos](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115).For more information about event-handler delegates, see [NIB: Events and Delegates](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115). Un evento no se producirá durante la carga o descarga de un formulario porque los cambios se esperan durante estas operaciones.A event will not occur during the loading or unloading of a form because changes are expected during these operations. ## Examples Este ejemplo muestra cómo registrar un y controlar la eventos.This example demonstrates registering a and handling the event.
